text:
@realDonaldTrump @CetranoSusan Except we have 325 million AMERICANS 🇺🇲, so that's
325 - 15 = 310 million AMERICANS 🇺🇲 who haven't been tested ‼️
NOW brag about that ‼️
When are you going to lead Our Nation in grieving the 100,000 AMERICANS 🇺🇲 who have NOW DIED from COVID-19 ☣️❓
🛑 #StopTheSpread 
#StopTrump https://t.co/ZoGkX1BVxS
